simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems
Class ContentWord

java.lang.Object
  simplenlg.lexicon.lexicalitems.ContentWord
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, LexicalItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Adjective, Noun, Symbol, Verb
public abstract class ContentWord
extends Object
implements LexicalItem, Cloneable

This is an abstract implementation of the LexicalItem interface, which implements a number of additional simplenlg.features inherited by the classes Noun, Verb, Adjective and Symbol. Every ContentWord has the following fields:

String baseForm: This is a string with which the ContentWord is initialised.

Category category: This is the grammatical Category, an element of the enum Category.

Author:
agatt
See Also:
LexicalItem, Noun, Adjective, Verb, Symbol
